nodes.text: Short-term memory enhancement was a Force ability that allowed an individual to 'replay' a recent memory in his or her head, gaining hyperaccuracy, and recalling a particular detail that was previously observed but not consciously remembered. Luke Skywalker was taught this power by Jedi Master Yoda. The ancient Jedi-turned Sith Lord Freedon Nadd also possessed this ability. So was former Sith apprentice of Lost Tribe of Sith Vestara Khai when using this technique recalled Allana Solo's face details.
